name: Awakened Eclipseborn Hawk
ability:
Sacrificial Pact Domain
On entry, create a domain with a power level equal to this card's damage that lasts for 3 turns.
While active:
- For the first active turn, all abilities from allies, enemies, and support cards are disabled.
- All enemies have damage reduced by 10% each turn.
- The opponent's damage reduction is converted to max health and equally divided to every living party member at the end of each turn.
Domains can only be activated once per party, and can only activate if there is no domain currently active or if the new domain is more powerful than the previous.
This card's domain is cancelled on death.

name: Awakened Impure Ghost
ability:
Cloned Purple Lightning

Bajrang Gun

name: Awakened Tormented Swordsman

Unrelenting Anger

On entry, choose a stance. Every time 30% HP is lost, roll to keep or switch stances.
- Momentum of Rage: Deals 125% damage to the current enemy. Below 75% HP, performs an additional strike for 150% damage. If the target dies while you're in this stance and below 35% HP, the next attack deals 175% damage to the next enemy at the cost of 15% HP.
- Reckoning of Souls: At the start of each round, for every dead card on the field (ally or enemy), this card gains +5% damage but loses 5% HP. Each kill grants this card an additional +10% stats.

name: Blood Valkyrie

-Deranged: Attacks trigger a red flame that deals 50% damage and applies a bleed for 20% damage that 2 turns

name: Celestial Fisherman

On the turn following the charge period, unleash a nuclear bomb that deals damage equal to 45% of your max HP to all enemies.

name: Mother of Creation

- The domain ends if its caster is defeated.
This skill can only activate once per battle, even if there are multiple cards with this skill. Only one domain skill can active at a time.
